Node.js test

bringing JavaScript to the server

Here's a timeline of Node.js development to this point

  • 2009 - Written by Ryan Dahl
  • 2009 - Demonstrated by Ryan Dahl at the inaugural European JSConf
  • 2011 - npm package manager created
  • 2011 - first native Windows Node.js build released
  • 2012 - Isaac Schlueter promoted to manage the project (by Ryan Dahl)
  • 2014 - Timothy J. Fontaine promoted to manage the project (by Isaac Schlueter)
  • 2014 - io.js forked from Node.js by Fedor Indutny
  • 2015 - neutral Node.js Foundation announced and the Node.js and io.js communities voted to work together under the foundation

If you have time, you should read about Node.js in the documentation on the official site.

Written and coded by P1xt.
